_source: speak;Man1;Did that guy finally leave?|He paid me a pretty penny to hide in my house for a while.|I was afraid he was going to trash the place!
speak;Eirika;He... Paid you? To hide in your house?|What an odd thing to do...

speak;Man1;I agree, but he gave a lot of money...|He seemed really desperate to get away from someone.|There was a beautiful young lady yelling really loudly for a...|I believe she said Rennac...|I wonder?...
